snippet.title: Horses - Exclusive Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description: Here's a fresh look at Horses in this creepy new trailer for the upcoming first-person horror adventure game. In Horses, you will take on the role of a summer worker taking a break from his college studies. You will be responsible for taking care of the farm and its animals for a fortnight. Each day, as you explore the farm, you'll encounter many "surprises," peeling back the layers of the farm's unsettling mysteries.
